text: Warning : This story contains major spoilers from Wednesday ’ s episode of Law & Order : Special Victims Unit. Read at your own risk. Another long - time cast member has exited Law & Order : Special Victims Unit. Raúl Esparza has left the long - running NBC procedural after six seasons, EW has learned exclusively. The actor joined SVU as Assistant District Attorney Rafael Barba in season 14 in a recurring capacity, before being upped to series regular in season 15. During Wednesday ’ s episode, Barba ultimately left the District Attorney ’ s office after pulling the plug on a brain dead child.
